Package userProfile

Class ProfileManager

java.lang.Object
userProfile.ProfileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProfileHandler
public class ProfileManager extends Object implements ProfileHandler
The ProfileManager class manages user profiles, including saving and loading profiles via serialization, as well as handling profile selection, deletion, and viewing history. Supports storing up to five user profiles for a specific user ID in a local file. Profiles are saved to a file named "profiles_{userId}.dat" in serialized format.
Author:
Trudy Ann Roberts

  • Constructor Details

    • ProfileManager

      public ProfileManager(int userId)
      Constructs a ProfileManager for a specific user ID. Loads any saved profiles from the user's profile file.

  • Method Details

    • addProfile

      public boolean addProfile(UserProfile profile)
      Adds a new profile if the maximum limit has not been reached. Saves the updated profile list to the file.
      Specified by:
      addProfile in interface ProfileHandler
      Parameters:
      profile - The UserProfile instance to be added
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully added; false if the maximum number of profiles is already reached

    • saveProfiles

      public void saveProfiles()
      Saves the current list of profiles to the user's profile file via serialization.
      Specified by:
      saveProfiles in interface ProfileHandler

    • loadProfiles

      public void loadProfiles()
      Loads profiles from the user's profile file. Initializes an empty list if the file is not found.
      Specified by:
      loadProfiles in interface ProfileHandler

    • deleteProfile

      public boolean deleteProfile(String profileName)
      Deletes a profile by name, if it exists, and updates the profiles file.
      Specified by:
      deleteProfile in interface ProfileHandler
      Parameters:
      profileName - The name of the profile to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully deleted; false if no profile with the specified name was found.

    • editProfile

      public boolean editProfile(String oldProfileName, String newProfileName, String newProfileType)
      Edits an existing profile by updating its name and type, then saves changes to file.
      Specified by:
      editProfile in interface ProfileHandler
      Parameters:
      oldProfileName - The current name of the profile to edit.
      newProfileName - The new name to assign to the profile.
      newProfileType - The new type to assign to the profile, which should be either "ADULT" or "CHILD".
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully edited; false if the profile was not found or if the new profile type was invalid.

    • promptUserToSelectProfile

      public void promptUserToSelectProfile()
      Prompts the user to select a profile from the available profiles.

    • selectProfile

      public String selectProfile()
      Displays a dialog to the user for selecting a profile from available profiles.
      Specified by:
      selectProfile in interface ProfileHandler
      Returns:
      The name of the selected profile, or null if no profiles are available or the user cancels the selection

    • getProfiles

      public List<UserProfile> getProfiles()
      Retrieves the list of profiles managed by this ProfileManager.
      Specified by:
      getProfiles in interface ProfileHandler
      Returns:
      An immutable or mutable list of UserProfile objects representing the user's profiles. Returns an empty list if no profiles exist.
